articles.description: Bobby Deol also spoke about dad Dharmendra and the scenario at home when he was growing up. Bobby Deol was last seen in Animal. | Bollywood
articles.content: Bobby Deol is basking in the praise for his performance in Sandeep Reddy Vanga's Animal that is running successfully in theatres. In an interview with Zoom Entertainment, the actor opened up about hi… [+2174 chars]
